::DrillBit::

DrillBit nodded, looking over at Quickstrike. He rememered that KitKat 
had wanted to talk with him, alone. "Wait, first what'd you want to 
talk to me about?" he asks her, his curiosity building.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She smiled at Drillbit. "Yes, we will be moving out of this base. 
> Destructor has managed to find another base that will suit our need 
> better. Please get the other ready to move out in a few hours." She 
> smiled at Drillbit. Then she turned to Quickstrike. "Please assist 
> Drillbit in getting everything ready to move out
